alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 3:58AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Independence, southeastern Cleburne and northwestern White Counties through 430 AM CST... At 358 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rose Bud, or 12 miles south of Heber Springs, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Steprock... Letona... Albion... Hickory Flat... Clay... Wilburn... Providence... Dewey... Sidon... Joy... Pickens in White County... Sunnydale... Velvet Ridge... Roosevelt... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for north central Arkansas.
